items.content_html: Task Planner App is a simple web app to help users manage daily tasks. With a clean interface, users can add, edit, mark as completed, and delete tasks. Ideal for personal, work, or study tasks, it‚Äôs built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, offering a lightweight and accessible solution in any browser.
